Scenic Tab displays beautiful images from some of the most picturesque places around the globe each time you open up a new tab and search the web.

By Clicking ‘Add to Chrome’, you are accepting and agreeing to install Scenic Tab, and understand that your browsers new tab will be changed to that provided by the service with search results by Yahoo. Your usage of this extension will be governed by the Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions links below.

Be inspired and enjoy a great search experience, while being transported to some of the most beautiful scenic destinations in the world.

Download it for free today!

Links:
